state.code:
graph LR A["
开始
"] --> B["
定义选择操作规则
"] B --> C["
拆分查询
"] C --> D["
将子查询分类
"] D --> E["
分类子查询中的选择操作
"] E --> F["
分类子查询中的其他操作
"] F --> G["
重新组合优化后的查询
"] G --> H["
返回优化后的查询
"] H --> I["
结束
"] style A fill:#bbf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px style I fill:#bbf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px style B fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px style C fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px style D fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px style E fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px style F fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px style G fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px style H fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px

graph LR A["
开始
"] --> B["
将查询拆分为子查询
"] B --> C["
定义成本估算函数
"] C --> D["
按成本对子查询进行排序
"] D --> E["
组合成最终的优化查询
"] E --> F["
返回优化后的查询
"] F --> G["
结束
"] style A fill:#bbf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px style G fill:#bbf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px style B fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px style C fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px style D fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px style E fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px style F fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px

开始

"] B --> C["
拆分查询
"] C --> D["
将子查询分类

分类子查询中的选择操作
"] E --> F["

重新组合优化后的查询
"] G --> H["
返回优化后的查询
"] H --> I["

"] style A fill:#bbf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px style I fill:#bbf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px style B fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px style C fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px style D fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px style E fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px style F fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px style G fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px style H fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px

graph LR A["
开始
"] --> B["
拆分查询
"] B --> C["
初始化动态规划表
"] C --> D["
定义成本估算函数
"] D --> E["
迭代子查询组合
"] E --> F["
评估子组合
"] F --> G["
生成候选组合
"] G --> H["
计算候选组合成本
"] H --> I["
比较并更新最优成本
"] I --> J["
是否遍历完所有子查询组合？
"] J -- 否 --> E J -- 是 --> K["
提取最终优化查询
"] K --> L["
优化查询是否为空？
"] L -- 是 --> M["
返回原始查询
"] L -- 否 --> N["
返回优化后的查询
"] M --> O["
结束
"] N --> O["
结束
"] style A fill:#bbf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px style O fill:#bbf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px style J fill:#f96,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px style L fill:#f96,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px

graph LR
    A[开始] --> B[拆分查询]
    B --> C[初始化动态规划表]
    C --> D[定义成本估算函数]
    D --> E[迭代子查询组合]
    E --> F[评估子组合]
    F --> G[生成候选组合]
    G --> H[计算候选组合成本]
    H --> I[比较并更新最优成本]
    I --> J{是否遍历完所有子查询组合？}
    J -- 否 --> E
    J -- 是 --> K[提取最终优化查询]
    
    K --> L{优化查询是否为空？}
    L -- 是 --> M[返回原始查询]
    L -- 否 --> N[返回优化后的查询]
    M --> O[结束]
    N --> O[结束]

    style A fill:#bbf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
    style O fill:#bbf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
    style J fill:#f96,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
    style L fill:#f96,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px

graph TB
    A[开始] --> B[拆分查询]
    B --> C[初始化动态规划表]
    C --> D[定义成本估算函数]
    D --> E[迭代子查询组合]
    E --> F[评估子组合]
    F --> G[生成候选组合]
    G --> H[计算候选组合成本]
    H --> I[比较并更新最优成本]
    
    I --> J{是否遍历完所有子查询组合？}
    J -- 否 --> E
    J -- 是 --> K[提取最终优化查询]
    K --> L{优化查询是否为空？}
    L -- 是 --> M[返回原始查询]
    L -- 否 --> N[返回优化后的查询]
    M --> O[结束]
    N --> O[结束]

    style A fill:#bbf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
    style O fill:#bbf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
    style J fill:#f96,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
    style L fill:#f96,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px

graph LR
    A[开始] --> B[拆分查询]
    B --> C[初始化动态规划表]
    C --> D[定义成本估算函数]

    F --> G[生成候选组合]
    G --> H[计算候选组合成本]
    H --> I[比较并更新最优成本]
    
    subgraph 第二行
        I --> J{是否遍历完所有子查询组合？}
        J -- 否 --> E
        J -- 是 --> K[提取最终优化查询]
        K --> L{优化查询是否为空？}
        L -- 是 --> M[返回原始查询]
        L -- 否 --> N[返回优化后的查询]
        M --> O[结束]
        N --> O[结束]
    end

    style A fill:#bbf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
    style O fill:#bbf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
    style J fill:#f96,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
    style L fill:#f96,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px

    F --> G[生成候选组合]

    end

        L -- 否 --> N[返回优化后的查询]
        M --> O[结束]

    G --> H[计算候选组合成本]
    H --> I[比较并更新最优成本]
    I --> J{是否遍历完所有子查询组合？}
    J -- 否 --> E
    J -- 是 --> K[提取最终优化查询]
    
    K --> L{优化查询是否为空？}
    L -- 是 --> M[返回原始查询]
    L -- 否 --> N[返回优化后的查询]
    M --> O[结束]
    N --> O[结束]

    style A fill:#bbf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
    style O fill:#bbf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
    style J fill:#f96,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
    style L fill:#f96,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px

graph TD
    A[开始] --> B[拆分查询]
    B --> C[初始化动态规划表]
    C --> D[定义成本估算函数]
    D --> E[迭代子查询组合]
    E --> F[评估子组合]
    F --> G[生成候选组合]
    G --> H[计算候选组合成本]
    H --> I[比较并更新最优成本]
    I --> J{是否遍历完所有子查询组合？}
    J -- 否 --> E
    J -- 是 --> K[提取最终优化查询]
    K --> L{优化查询是否为空？}
    L -- 是 --> M[返回原始查询]
    L -- 否 --> N[返回优化后的查询]
    M --> O[结束]
    N --> O[结束]

    style A fill:#bbf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
    style O fill:#bbf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
    style J fill:#f96,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
    style L fill:#f96,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
